SELECT chatroom_id as chatroomId, board_id as boardId, chatroom_name as chatroomName, reg_date as regDate FROM chatroom WHERE chatroom_id = #{id}
SELECT chatroom_id as chatroomId, board_id as boardId, chatroom_name as chatroomName, reg_date as regDate FROM chatroom WHERE board_id = #{id}

SELECT cr.chatroom_id as chatroomId, cr.board_id as boardId, cr.chatroom_name as chatroomName, cr.reg_date as regDate FROM chatroom as cr JOIN chatroom_user as cru ON cr.chatroom_id = cru.chatroom_id WHERE cru.user_id = #{id}
